Header <boost/math/common_factor.hpp>

This header simply includes the headers <boost/math/common_factor_ct.hpp> and <boost/math/common_factor_rt.hpp>.

Note

This is a legacy header: it used to contain the actual implementation, but the compile-time and run-time facilities were moved to separate headers (since they were independent of each other).
